# chen diagram of 
```{dot}
graph ER {
    layout=neato;
    node [shape=box]; User, Budget, Actuals, Transaction
    node [shape=ellipse]; userID, budgetID, expectedExpense, expectedIncome, cost, income, transactionID, realExpense, realIncome 
    node [shape=diamond,style=filled,color=lightgrey]; manages, compares_to, consists_of, creates

    User -- creates [label = "1"]
    User -- manages [label = "1"]    
    Budget -- manages [label = "n",len=1.2]
    Budget -- compares_to [label = "1",len=1.2]
    Actuals -- compares_to [label = "1"]
    Actuals -- consists_of [label = "1"]
    Transaction -- consists_of [label = "n"]
    Transaction -- creates [label = "n"]

    User -- userID

    Budget -- budgetID
    Budget -- expectedExpense [len=1.5]
    Budget -- expectedIncome [len=1.5]

    Actuals -- realExpense
    Actuals -- realIncome

    Transaction -- transactionID
    Transaction -- cost
    Transaction -- income
}
